org.qcri.rheem.core.platform

Interface Breakpoint

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CardinalityBreakpoint, ConjunctiveBreakpoint, FixBreakpoint, NoIterationBreakpoint
    Functional Interface:
    This is a functional interface and can therefore be used as the assignment target for a lambda expression or method reference.

    @FunctionalInterface
public interface Breakpoint
    Describes when to interrupt the execution of an ExecutionPlan.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static Breakpoint NONE
      Breakpoint implementation that never breaks.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean permitsExecutionOf(ExecutionStage stage, ExecutionState state, OptimizationContext context)
      Tests whether the given ExecutionStage can be executed.

    • Field Detail

      • NONE

        static final Breakpoint NONE
        Breakpoint implementation that never breaks.

    • Method Detail

      • permitsExecutionOf

        boolean permitsExecutionOf(ExecutionStage stage,
                           ExecutionState state,
                           OptimizationContext context)
        Tests whether the given ExecutionStage can be executed.
        Parameters:
        stage - whose execution is in question
        state - current ExecutionState
        context - OptimizationContext of the last optimization process
        Returns:
        whether the ExecutionStage should be executed
